entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
